channel.title: Commentary Articles on AI4Bhārat
channel.description: Recent content in Commentary Articles on AI4Bhārat

item.title: The Case for AI4Bharat
item.description: FOUNDERS: AI4Bharat is a voluntary community founded by us - Mitesh Khapra and Pratyush Kumar.

item.title: Our Process for Collaborating on AI Projects
item.description: An A.I. process with high adherence is as an essential component to be successful in our mission of collaborative innovation at scale.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence for Indian Railways
item.description: Can we deploy Artificial Intelligence to learn from historical operations to make Indian Railways more efficient with time?

item.title: Between Humans and Machines: Explainable Artificial Intelligence
item.description: We need explainable Artificial Intelligence to avoid risks from malfunctioning systems. The recent crash of the Ethiopian Airlines aeroplane on 10th March 2019 in which all 157 people aboard died, raises some fundamental questions regarding technology.

item.title: Overview of AI in Indian Healthcare
item.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has emerged as a rapidly evolving technology and has seen widespread acceptance in many fields.

item.title: Remote Sensing with Satellite Imagery with Deep Learning
item.description: With the proliferation of satellites for remote sensing, myriad use-cases have emerged for applying computer vision for sustainability goals of monitoring forests, flood plains, mines, and farms.

item.title: Tamil Nadu e-Governance: A Case-Study
item.description: A case study of successful e-governance initiatives by Government of Tamil Nadu. Governments have to efficiently cater to a large number of services such as licensing, regulatory services, and citizen services across various domains such as health, education, and agriculture.
